summary: Devin W. O'Neill, R.C.P. was initially disciplined for deliberate inattention to patient care, specifically failing to check and change tracheostomy tubes. After entering a consent order and enrolling in a professional rehabilitation program, he subsequently violated its terms by testing positive for illicit substances and failing toxicology screenings. As a result, his license to practice respiratory care has been summarily suspended due to the immediate risk he poses to public health, safety, and welfare.
